title: Ib / Ib Green Edition
description:
"Ib" is a horror game created by kouri with the RPG Maker 2000 engine. The game follows nine-year-old Ib on a visit with her parents to an art museum, which soon takes a twisted turn as the lights go out and the famous Guertena's exotic pieces of art become all too life-like. While searching for a way to return to her own world, she finds a man named Garry, who helps her in her quest to escape the cursed gallery of the Fabricated World. As the game progresses, Ib and Garry meet a mysterious girl by the name of Mary. Depending on how the player progresses throughout the game, the ending will vary, as many of the player's choices will affect the game's ending.

"Ib: Green Edition" is a fan-made replica of the game featuring an original ending not found the the game. It is NOT a patch/modification for the game. It is a completely separate program, and any files contained within should NOT be mixed with files of the normal "Ib" game.

The game is focused on exploration and puzzle-solving. There are no battles, and it very rarely demands your quick reflexes.

A game by kouri made in RPG Maker 2000
